Reviews.Title: just started with it
Reviews.Author: rosie-corie "rosie-corie"
Reviews.Content: And it seems great.  OK, the analogue input may not be brilliant, but I don't think its worse that what I got on the older TVs we had.  And the picture with the DVD with digital input is fabulous.  Sound is fine also; the controls and the menus are intuitive and easy.As long as it holds up, I'm going to be very glad I got this one.Two small complaints:  the manual left out something about hooking up the dvd that I found on the samsung website - you may need to change the player's mode of output if you are starting with component cables.  AND it took me quite a while to find out how to use the codes for other devices.  OK, you input them, but how??  And what was said doesn't seem to work.  But given the quality of the set, I really don't count these as worth any minus points.If you get stuck at some point, try the samsung website.  Go to this model and look over at the right hand side of the screen and you'll see something like "TV help".  Tons of standard questions, manuals, etc.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 26" HDTV  Is Great!
Reviews.Author: Creeksidehiker
Reviews.Content: After much research and many trips to the big box stores, I bought the Samsung 26" HDTV from Amazon for use in a bedroom with viewing distance of 12 feet.  Amazon's free shipping offer and no sales tax resulted in 25% lower cost than any walk-in store.  Extended warranties are not recommended by Consumer Reports, etc, because these HDTVs have outstanding reliability, so that made me more comfortable with a no-warranty internet order.  Amazon stated 5-10 business days shipping, but after just 2 days, the UPS guys were at my doorstep handing me the box.  I attached the base and hooked up the set in about 30 minutes.  It worked perfectly on my 90-channel non-HD cable service.  A month later the cable company installed our HD box ($9/month rental) and the 20 HD channels are fantastic.  The superbowl game was incredibly sharp.  At first, channel switching was slightly slower than I'm used to, but with the HD box it is back to normal (fast).  I chose Samsung for its brilliant picture quality.  Once that was decided, my quandry was picture size.  I started at 20", then 23", then settled on 26".  Although the viewing is ok for a small room, 32" would have been even better, but it would have dwarfed our room.  If you are undecided, go larger.  The 16:9 HD format requires a much larger nominal size than the old 4:3 standard def.  I am very pleased with this purchase and highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: 5 Stars for Samsung "Surpassing The Rest"
Reviews.Author: Chris E
Reviews.Content: First up, this TV is gorgeous! The piano-black finish really enhances the picture and brings out the deep blacks in the high-contrast images.  The picture can't be beat (and I did a ton of comparison shopping -- in-store & online).  The TV is super-slim compared to the competitors - its awesome to look at even when it's "off".  Call me shallow, but I was concerned as to how the TV would look in my room & truth of the matter is that I couldn't be more pleased.  I feel like I bought a piece of art!Picture-detail and colors are amazing!  Vibrant, crystal-clear images -- high-tech/theater quality.  The menu is great too; its really user-friendly and allows a ton of options so that you can customize picture/sound settings to your meet your preferences.  It's simple to set-up, so no need to hire a pro.My only concern was the speakers; and I'm sad to say, they leave alot to be desired.  I had hoped the 2 "hidden" 5 watt speakers would be sufficient for my small room, but they proved to be inferior.  I hear a tinny quality and cannot discern any deapths between the tonal output.  I was so unhappy with the audio that I upgraded by purchasing samsung's mid-priced home theater-in-a-box (Q45).  After doing so, I have been very pleased & I'm really happy with that decision.  Also, make sure to realize that if the speakers were not internal and tucked into the bottom of the set, it would not look as sleek and stunning as it does.  The benefits of the 51D's sleek design outweighs all of these considerations!The "glare" factor you may have read about in other reviews, has NOT proved to be an issue for me.  Granted, the exterior looks 10x better with the lights turned "off", but even when they are on, I have not found this to be at all distracting (and I'm really picky about such details, before buying this set I was worried about the possibility of glare since I do alot of watching with my lights "on".  Just make sure you dust the set at least 1-2x/month -- not anything too drastic (make sure you buy the lcd cleaner at your local electronics store-- no windex, pledge, or water!)I can't imagine owning a different set.  I'm so happy with this purchase that I would recommend this set to everyone I know.  I don't think as many people would have as much as an issue with the speakers as I did.  My ears are super-sensitive and detect more than the average listener, so don't necessarily weigh my audio criteria against yours -- its a matter of priority (the rest of my family thinks they were great!)  My room is only 10' x 12' but if I had a larger room I would not hesitate to go with the 32" model.

Reviews.Title: Excellent LCD TV
Reviews.Author: Andrew R. Walker
Reviews.Content: I just received this TV and absolutely love it!  The integrated tuner makes this an excellent buy and I get almost all of the available local channels in HD (in a not-so-great location >30 miles from all the transmitters) with an indoor antenna!  The picture quality is amazing and when paired with my Samsung R-135 DVD Recorder with HD up-conversion over HDMI...the picture is stunning.Highly recommended, no dead pixels, and an excellent value.  Samsung may cost more than comparably-sized panels, but the quality, fit, and finish more than make up for the added cost.

Reviews.Title: It's always about the setup and the bottom line
Reviews.Author: The Unluddited "Tim"
Reviews.Content: An excellent set depending on how you set it up and use it.My criteria were:- 24-27" Wide-screen 16X9 (for small sitting area off kitchen)- High Definition- Integrated HDTV tuner (ATSC)- LCD flat panel with minimum 1366X768 resolution- 8ms response time or better- High contrast to counteract a well-lit area- HDMI input(s)- An excellent picture both in-store and in online reviewsThe Samsung LNS2651D met them all. It's mated to an HDTV satellite receiver (with dish and rooftop HD antenna) and an HD upconverting DVD player. I'm currently receiving about 17 HD channels including the "major networks", HBO, Showtime, Discovery, TNT, and a couple of ESPNs. This is important because it covers a pretty high percentage of our TV time. If you're watching the CNN and the Weather Channel 90% of the time, this set's probably overkill...look for a 4:3 EDTV and save your money. On the other hand, if primetime major network is your thing, the ATSC tuner should give you a good supply of HD quality viewing without satellite so long as your antenna setup is up to the task.This Samsung really shines in high definition, where many movies and shows leap out at you with an almost 3D image. It's wonderful with widescreen DVD, especially the HD or HD upconverting players. Colors are true, vibrant, and well-defined. Ghosting hasn't been observed, even in fast action sports, with the low response time. Contrast, brightness, and other video adjustments may initially be necessary to get an optimal picture, this is especially true with standard definition sources. Blacks are generally well done, with the caveat that some detail within blacks can be lost, especially if the overall scene is dark. No edge problems are apparent; convergence settings look good out of the box. Its 170 degree viewing angle seems as advertised and the picture doesn't easily wash out, even with too much sunshine in the room.The LNS2651D is good-to-very good in standard definition with a 4:3 aspect ratio (no fan of stretching/cropping the picture, so it's black bars on the sides for me!), about what you'd expect from 480i channels on an LCD. The mandatory noise reduction/picture enhancement circuitry (DNIe) generally works well but the inability to disengage it (without some service menu trickery) is a bit of a disadvantage but even then, it only seems to be a slight problem with low definition material.Audio quality isn't bad for what it is, small built-in speakers on a thin TV. The sound isn't tinny or shrill, but its not exactly room filling either. You do get some traces of the "SRS Tru-Surround" audio effects with movies and other programs at times, but if you're looking for theater-like audio....you know the drill, that's a separate purchase.Fit and finish on the LNS2651D is remarkable with the glossy piano-black cabinet; an exquisite-looking television. Careful searches have revealed no dead or ailing pixels on this screen, which is always a relief. The set is also attached to an articulating arm (separate purchase) allowing it to be turned completely perpendicular to its wall position. Using an HDMI connection means only three wires (two HDMIs and power) run through the wall, the arm, and then to the panel instead of 4 to 6 or more wires with other configurations.The off-kitchen area went from a mammoth 19" CRT with the rudimentary satellite receiver to a wall mounted articulating 26" widescreen HD flat panel with an HD satellite receiver and an HD upconverting DVD player. This setup was completely wired and installed for a little under $1,200...not bad when the MSRP is $100 more than that on the LCD TV alone. Buying online really makes a difference. The Samsung LNS2651D is recommended for HD and DVD lovers without reservation. You'll not be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: AMAZING PICTURE - Beautiful Design - BUY IT NOW
Reviews.Author: B. Flamenco "Explorer"
Reviews.Content: I LOVE this TV!!!!! The setup was so easy it took me 10 minutes from the moment I opened the box. The image quality is amazing and the TV reception for my local HD channels (over the antenna) is just as crisp as my digital cable box... I never thought I could find a reasonable LCD with Plasma quality picture. I have a 55" Hitachi Director Series Plasma in my living room and was looking for a nice small TV with great picture for my Bedroom.Well, I found what I was looking for..  GO FOR IT YOURSELF..  I can only recommend this unit.

Reviews.Title: Great Pic with So-So Sound
Reviews.Author: Consumericious
Reviews.Content: Update:  I now have an HD antenna, so I still don't pay for any service--ha, ha!  I also got a DVR with a hard drive, so now I can record stuff.The audio is only half the output of the Sharp Aquos of the same size (but a better pic), and because I don't have it hooked to a stereo, the Samsung's sound is just okay.I've had this TV for five years now, and there have never been any problems.  I got the small size to fit into an antique TV cabinet.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: S. Roberts "A gamer, somwhere between hardcor...
Reviews.Content: Sorry for the unoriginal title, but I honestly can't think of a better way to describe this TV.  I am 18, and this will end up going to college with me, so it is a perfect dorm size.  I am using it primarily for my Playstation 3, and with HDMI cables and 5.1 surround sound, let me tell you, I am in heaven.  Picture quality is amazing, not as good as some larger TV's but they have a size and resolution advantage (1080p versus 720p)  Going from SD to HD with my PS3 games is like night to day.  Also, I never knew DVD's could look so amazing.  I only have one Blu Ray disc, and as expected, great picture quality.  One small issue I noticed was that in certain situations there is a bit of a flicker, but I am sure this has nothing to do with the TV itself, but more LCD as a technology.  Also I noticed some strange effects on very dark scenes but this was fixed by lowering the backlight brightness.The fit and finish of this set is top notch.  It has a glossy black surface that catches the light and looks stunning.  (Especially since it matches the my PS3 =)  The plugs on the back of the TV are really stuck on there, no loose fittings here.  Unfortunately there is no DVI port, but a DVI>HDMI converter should cover you for your computer monitor needs.  The Menu is easy to navigate and helpful.  The remote is great, I love the way it fits in my hand, however it is a bit long, may need to shift your hand around to get some of the buttons, but unless you are very very lazy this should be a nonissue.Overall I am very satisfied, and feel that this TV was well worth my money.  It is a pleasure to look at and a pleasure to use.  The only gripes I have are that the power cord is a bit too short, and the case will show dust and smudges like nobody's business.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal and amazing picture
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: This TV sells for over $1100 in Circuit city and Best buy. I received mine a few days ago and set it up in just a few minutes. The picture in HD is crystal clear and the sound is very clean. Absolutely no complaints!!! If you are looking for a smaller flat panel LCD, this is the one to get.

Reviews.Title: Very good for the price
Reviews.Author: V. Akis "renascence man"
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with the picture quality, overall functionality and look.  The sound quality is bad.  The speakers buzz at some frequencies especially during talk shows.  I have attached external speakers through the earphone plug in the back, this solved the problem. Perhaps I could use a better external tuner in the future.  In brief, the set is very good to excellent as a monitor, but not great as a stand alone TV system.  At this point in time it is a good value for the price.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Video quality and great price
Reviews.Author: D. Nandy
Reviews.Content: I have had this TV for about 3 months in my bedroom and I have it hooked to a Pioneer DV-490V-S Progressive Scan DVD Player with HDMI. Also have a standard sat. tuner through the cable input. The HDMI connection from the DVD player is excellent and the standard cable picture is also great through it pales in comparison to the 1080i from DVD player. Let the DVD player handle the resolution for the best performance, but this is a great pairing.I have also hooked up my laptop on occasion with a wireless keyboarad and mouse and get excellent browsing from my bed.All in all, I am very satisfied with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Most features...Not all - Overall excellent set
Reviews.Author: Jack W. Weiss "AllAboutTL"
Reviews.Content: I bought this set for a number of reasons: 1) I wanted the "narrower" 26in width with the speakers along the bottom to fit into my desk cabinet. 2)I wanted a PC input 3) I wanted two coax inputs, one for OTA (over the air, free HDTV) and a standard cable coax input. 4) Built-in ATSC tuner. I'm not using a STB (set top box) at this time. This LCD unit was the only 26" set that could meet these requirements.  I paid ~$800 in March of 2007 - free shipping from Amazon, new not refurb. HD picture quality is as good as my Panasonic Plasma, analog picture quality is very good, sound is adequate for my office. I'm not a gamer, so no opinion regarding that.Features I wish this set had :  QAM tuner (allows tuning local HDTV over standard cable TV connection (no STB required), remote is clumsy when direct selecting a channel number ("enter" key is well below the numbers keypad.I would buy this HDTV again.

Reviews.Title: Great LCD TV
Reviews.Author: Marc Onetto "modestnom"
Reviews.Content: In my modest opinion this is the best image quality and value for money in LCD. Only defect is that the set does not rotate on the support. For that you need to go to the 32"

Reviews.Title: A good product at a good value
Reviews.Author: Stephen B. West "SBW"
Reviews.Content: This was our second flat panel. We bought it for our bedroom. We have been so happy with this TV that we will probably purchase a second one (with a larger screen) for our main TV in the den. I did a great deal of research on the differenct brands of flat panels before purchasing this set. The research appears to have paid off.

Reviews.Title: Used for the Price of New!
Reviews.Author: M. Enriquez "Mr. E"
Reviews.Content: I just received this TV yesterday evening.  Upon opening it, I couldn't help to notice that I had received a "used" item vs. the new one I ordered.  Needless to say, it will be going back.  Amazon has informed me that they will be sending me a replacement, so until then, I'll keep my fingers tightly crossed!Pros:*The picture quality of this TV on the XBOX 360 is amazing!*The color and brightness range is exceptional.*The sound is mediocre but it doesn't matter if you are planning to use a surround sound system.*The PC connection when using a standard VGA cable works great.  The max resolution is 1360x768 60 MHz refresh rate.Cons:*I've noticed one drawback; don't plan using the XBOX 360 VGA cable.  For some reason the signal is not supported.*You are not able to use two AIR signals when using PIP.*The TV looks tremendously better in a dark room.  (As with any LCD.)

Reviews.Title: Extremely sharp picture, easy set up, with so-so sound
Reviews.Author: Ken
Reviews.Content: This 26" fit perfectly in the space I had in the cabinet and had the higher degree of resolution.  Price was higher than a few on Amazon, but for what you get, it is well worth the extra.  It seems strange to me that the sound is not much better than the very old tube TV I had but I guess they expect you will fit it into a sound system you already have if you are willing to pay for HDTV.

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: K. Gray
Reviews.Content: Got this TV out of the Box and was up and running it as my PC monitor in minutes, Great picture quality from an LCD. Very happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LNS2651D
Reviews.Author: William A. Fray
Reviews.Content: I have had the TV for a week or two, and it's working out great.  The picture is really clear, and the surrround sound works great.  The setup was easy.  All one would do is connect the cable and power cord to the back of the TV, and you're watching TV.  The TV has 3 picture settings-16 to 9, zoom 1 and 2, 4 to 3.  I tried all 3, and the picture is clear.  I like the channel setting.  It's where one can add, rewmove, or pic a favorite channel.  It also has a custom picture equalizer-brightness, contrast, fine tune, red/green, tint.  The hand held controller works great.  Nothing really fancy, your average contoller.

Reviews.Title: First flat screen
Reviews.Author: Dean
Reviews.Content: After my main CRT TV stopped working, I did extensive research, online and at retail stores. The screen couldn't be larger than 26" due to space constraints. After much analysis I picked the Samsung. Amazon offerred it for over $300 less than the retail stores. I was concerned about the time estimated for the free delivery option but it showed up in two days.It was easy to set up and start running. I wasn't sure how to set up my DVD recorder/player, but the tech support was fast and efficient.The picture, using cable, is sharp and clear.All in all, I recommend this unit highly, both for price and operation.

Reviews.Title: Love this TV
Reviews.Author: Genie
Reviews.Content: I needed a smaller TV for our bedroom and bought this one in February.  Our bedroom has 360 degree all around windows so I would have glare issues with the old TV there.  I especially liked the 4000:1 contrast ratio, 500 cd/m2 brightness rating.  I am very pleased with the TV, it's picture is superb, no glare ever - even when the sun shines into our room.  I highly recommend this TV.

Reviews.Title: Can it get any better?!
Reviews.Author: Bibliotek
Reviews.Content: Love this TV.  This model by Samsung comes with our highest recommendations.  Great viewing.

Reviews.Title: Almost perfect
Reviews.Author: Katelyn "Katie-Kat"
Reviews.Content: I got my new TV in stunningly fast time. It took only 10 minutes to open the box and connect to my system. The picture is awesome, and sound quality is good as well. On screen navigation is simple, and I looked at the manual only an hour after watching the beautiful picture. Please note, this is not a perfect buy, because the spec sheet is wrong. According to the Amazon description, and the manual, there are supposed to be additional connections on the side of the TV, but in fact, there are none. No serial, additional component or s-video on the side, or anywhere, they simply don't exist. But otherwise it is one of the best LCD HDTV's for the money. XBox-360 hook up was simple, and in game mode, my nephews tell me Gears of War and Call of Duty 3 are simple awesome to play now. If you are buying and planning to use the additional connections keep shopping, this is not for you. Otherwise, no complaints.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: Matthew Aborn
Reviews.Content: Recently bought this tv and hooked it up to my high def from my cable provider. It is a wonderful TV! Great color and beautiful sleek design. I had it mailed to me too, which was really no problem and it came quickly with no damage. I would reccomend this TV to anybody.

Reviews.Title: This HD is a TD for me
Reviews.Author: Joseph Obrien
Reviews.Content: This is a great buy, so good that I plan to move up to a 40" sometime this year. Just love the crisp picture on all channels and the sound is superb. HD viewing is a real boost. Wish there were more HD channels. Buy it you'll love it. The ebony frame gives the illusion of a floating picture. If sports is a must in your household..then Samsung is the one.

Reviews.Title: I got a dud
Reviews.Author: MUrhino
Reviews.Content: Received this TV from amazon last night and within 30 min of turning it on, the sound went out.  I've had more time to mess with all the settings today and everything is set properly.  It doesn't seem to matter what I have hooked up to it as far as A/V equip goes either.  Right now it's a basic coax cable, but no matter what channel, when it messes up, the whole TV is going haywire.  After turning it off and then back on it fixes the problem, but only for a minute or so.  After multiple experiments, it stays on for about 30 min after sitting turned off for an extended period of time, then after turning it off and on, it will only work for about one minute after....I did that about seven times and every time the sound messed up.  About half the time the video was also scrambled and then went out....simply disappointed and frustrated as now I have to deal with Samsung customer service....awesome.

Reviews.Title: Poor sound
Reviews.Author: tisha
Reviews.Content: sound has been a problem since day one of purchase.Static comes and goes. At first I thoutht it was the cable connection and had them try and correct the problem. Would not reccommend this product, although I have 3 other samsung TV's they are great

Reviews.Title: Great TV..Great Value..screen background not as black as Sony
Reviews.Author: Mark in Illinois
Reviews.Content: Purchased this TV because my wife wouldn't let me get a bigger unit for the Living room. She thought 32" or more would be overpowering. So, as usual, I let her have her way. This TV was well recommended already and I have always had great luck with Samsung Electronics in the past (Video, DVD players, disk drives, monitors). It performs well and for the price is a great set. We have it hooked up to DirectTV and the picture is crystal clear digital and our Playstation 3 performs terrific as a High Definition Blue-Ray player. The only drawbacks are that the screen background is not that black, at least not as black when compared to a Sony high-end set. Also the viewing angles are a little limited and the sound is a little wimpy from the built in speakers. However, most people now have in home theater systems so that point is probably not very important. All in all, a dependable tv for a reasonable price. Not exactly the best, but definitely above the rest.

Reviews.Title: Excelente
Reviews.Author: Roberto A. Ortiz Hernandez "zenkai"
Reviews.Content: Muy buen televisor. Increible para ver peliculas, tambien lo tengo como 2o monitor de mi PC, y los videojuegos, no se dija. El modo de ahorro de energia, es muy util, sobre todo en la noche cuando solo tienes la tv prendida.

Reviews.Title: dead after 13 months and 4 days
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "WEBOne"
Reviews.Content: This is my 2nd one of these - the first one lasted 3 weeks - this one lasted 13 months and 4 days and has the same problem - sound but no picture.I'm giving up on samsung - this is my 3rd samsung product to die this year - a 19" monitor, a 22" monitor, now this tv...Picture is good while it lasts, but I don't know how they keep ther rep. if this is as good as their products get.

Reviews.Title: Nice gaming tv for my PS3
Reviews.Author: Video Pro
Reviews.Content: Great picture and has a split sceen setting so you can play on your game system with the HDMI cable and watch your TV program and the same time.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Joseph King III "JK3MD"
Reviews.Content: This television has a vibrant and crisp picture.  I was very impressed.  It's color surpassses the 40" Sony Bravia LCD.

Reviews.Title: Opinion of LNS2651D TV
Reviews.Author: Loraine Arnold "Loraine"
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with the picture quality of this TV. No complaints.

Reviews.Title: JUST GREAT
Reviews.Author: Thomas E. Devine
Reviews.Content: I INSTALLED THIS IN MY RV, IT WAS LIGHT WEIGHT, GOOD CONECTORS SO YOU DON'T SEE THE WIRES.  THE PICTURE IS GREAT AND I HAVE THE SOUND WIRED TO MY SURROUND SYSTEM.  BETTER THEN I HAVE AT HOME.

Reviews.Title: Almost Perfect TV
Reviews.Author: Lawrence Karpovich "LarrDogg77"
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv after a lot of shopping around.  It had to best picture by far. It had 2 HDMI ports ,which almost no tv's this size have more than one. The only this that doesn't make it perfect is that there is no Quam tuner. When I bought the tv almost 2 months ago, Samsung did not offer one in any of their smaller lcd tv's, but now they do.  So I would suggest if you want free clear quam HD from your cable company, get one of the new 53 series models.  If this is not a factor this is a great choice.

Reviews.Title: Hits the mark
Reviews.Author: Craig Roessler
Reviews.Content: Easy to set up.  Gets the job done.  I'd recommend this set for anyone with limited space or in need of a smaller set.

Reviews.Title: LNS2651D
Reviews.Author: William Walker
Reviews.Content: This LCD HDTV is a good fit for a child room.The parameters of this LCD HDTV are excellent.The LCD HDTV price is reasonable.One should carefully compare this LCD HDTV with other LCD HDTV to ensure that it fit your needs.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!! Great Deal!!
Reviews.Author: M Tass
Reviews.Content: I just got this TV and it is great... I didn't have HD for the first few days, so I didn't get the full effect but when I did get HD the picture quality was amazing, I'm only 16 so I don't really know that much about different TV's, but after some research and price comparisons I concluded this was the best choice.. And it really was because of the great sale Amazon is running now... hopefully I will get the playstation 3 so I have HD gaming too...If you want a great TV, for a cheap price this is the one to get, 26" for under $1,000 is a very good deal.

Reviews.Title: Great TV Very Good Price
Reviews.Author: J. Williams
Reviews.Content: I've had this TV for three weeks or so.  The screen is beautiful and the contrast is super sharp.  Standard def broadcasts look good but HD is absolutely gorgeous.  I've watched more movies in the past three weeks than I have in the previous year.  No kidding!  It is really cool to watch a movie in the original aspect ratio.  I love to watch the Kung Fu Channel on Dish Network.  Bruce Lee like I've never seen him!There are plenty of inputs and two HDMI inputs.  My only complaint about this tv is that I didn't find it earlier.  Go to the store and check out this tv and then come back to Amazon to buy.  I checked prices extensively for two weeks and this is the best deal by a longshot.

Reviews.Title: Ok for digital input, mediocre for analog
Reviews.Author: J. Lahue
Reviews.Content: TV is ok with an analog cable input.  I didn't expect brilliance with this TV for analog signals.  The biggest disappointment with this TV is how limited the PIP is.  If you are viewing an analog signal on the main display, then the PIP only works with an HDMI input source.  If using the AV1 or S-Video input on main display, PIP only works with digital TV or HDMI input.  If using digital TV on main display, PIP only works with AV1, S-Video or Component input.  PIP only has real choices if the main display is showing something from an HDMI input.  So if you are interested in this TV (and it is really good for digital input), then unless you have an HDMI input source, PIP is a useless feature.Also note that if you are using an analog input (such as cable), then channel changes are very slow.  Most TVs have an almost instantaneous channel change.  Here, it takes about 2 seconds to flip to the next channel.  If you are rapid channel flipper (like I am) than you have to learn to be patient with the TV.

Reviews.Title: Expensive but a nice tv
Reviews.Author: Joe B "JBB"
Reviews.Content: A pricey TV but a very nice pic and set up was easy.

Reviews.Title: TV Review
Reviews.Author: Henry R. Tomaino
Reviews.Content: I love the TV with the exception of the speakers and too thin remote.  If the volume is slightly loud, there is distortion and the remote is too narrow and should have larger buttons.

Reviews.Title: LCD HDTV- Samsung
Reviews.Author: William Marsh
Reviews.Content: Incredible!!...1st was the immediate delivery (faster than I expected) and 2nd was receiving such a great HDTV.  This Samsung is outstanding!I am in the process of buying another, larger one, for the den. I will definately purchase from Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Nice all-around LCD TV!
Reviews.Author: vt "vt"
Reviews.Content: I'm very pleased with the picture quality on the Hi-Def channels. But, the TV reveals all of the flaws when watching the regular 'SD' resolution channels, thus making SD hard to watch.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Samsung LCD HDTV
Reviews.Author: Goheels92
Reviews.Content: I love the Samsung 26" LCD HDTV that I ordered for my bedroom.  Great picture, easy to use...  It came way faster than it was supposed to.  When I get ready to buy a 46" LCD HDTV I will look first at Samsung!!

Reviews.Title: Great TV and Easy to Use
Reviews.Author: M. Vogel
Reviews.Content: We were able to hook it up to a regular analog cable and got clear pictures, even of old reruns.It's as good as TV reruns on the cable channels are going to get.Where the high definition is really visible is on the new X-Box 360 that we hooked up.  There, you can actually use the HD capability of this TV.We will be watching DVD's on it shortly.Thanks

Reviews.Title: Very happy with the purchase
Reviews.Author: Sameer Kamani "Sammy"
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with this purchase.  Granted no warranty but I checked with about 10 online stores and some brick-n-mortar stores and found Amazon to carry the best price.The only reason I took away a star was because the TV's menu when the channel is changed is so tiny on the top left corner that I have to squint to find out what channel I just punched in Or if I am looking to find out what channel I am on, I have to be very close up to the TV.  This is not nice.Other than that minor detail, this is one of the best purchases I have ever made.

Reviews.Title: Very pleased
Reviews.Author: Tony Barritt "Praiser"
Reviews.Content: Beautiful picture when you give it a HD signal! Would buy it again!

Reviews.Title: Evaluation of Samsung LNS2651D
Reviews.Author: M. H. Leaman "Hersh"
Reviews.Content: This product seems like the best value for cost and performs as advertised.  I would recommend to others, including my best friend.

Reviews.Title: Unbeatable Quality
Reviews.Author: Becky Homecky
Reviews.Content: This HDTV was more than I ever expected.  The picture quality is awesome! The controls were easy to use and learn.  It is truly enjoyable! The only difficulty is hooking it up with other components, such as a DVD/VCR.  I highly recommend this nodel and would purchase it again for another room in my home.

Reviews.Title: JUNK
Reviews.Author: ZJ "ZJ"
Reviews.Content: picture went out after 3 months...  when I took it to get fixed under the parts warrenty...  it was still $300 to repair.  JUNK

Reviews.Title: Very good set
Reviews.Author: K. Adams
Reviews.Content: It's light, made it extremely possible to take it home from my work address. Looked clean unpacking, no damage, just a brilliant look even when the television is off.Now when it's on, the colors, brightness, everything is just amazing. Put a million candlepower spotlight next to it and it'll still show very vibrant color (small exaggeration).I use it for my XBOX 360 using the RGB component cables and it just looks great, although "game mode" can make the darks too dark in some cases.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, really nice picture
Reviews.Author: R. R. Fabello "Double R's"
Reviews.Content: Just got this yesterday, it was delivered by a UPS guy, who brings to our door single-handedly by himself and we're at a 2nd floor without elevator. I was really nervous ordering something this big on amazon because you cant return this 'cuz amazon has only in home warranty repair on TV's. Even though amazon has this policy where the ordered TV should be unpack on delivery and you should inspect if there something broken, you can refuse to sign so there wouldnt be a burden on you because you cant return the TV... or something like that. Anyhow, when he were about to give me his portable thingy to sign, I ask him if he were instructed to unpack this, and he said he's only here for delivery, so I signed.  I inspected the box, it looks like its well taken care, I unpack and connected it thru my PC, I open up pixel detector buddy and carefully inspected dead pixels, there were NONE. I open up bunch of video files and this TV has gorgeous black, the colors are great. Exterior looks great, it has glossy piano black exterior. I was opting for 32 inch of the same model but amazon.com doesn't ship to Hawaii. This TV is just a bit bigger than my 2407FPW Dell monitor. The speaker a bit weak, but then again, for its size, this is just good only for small rooms and not on living room, yeah I use this on my room. My only consolation for TV is that I hope to get the Mustang wall mount for free via rebate. I would have bought 32" model on reputable store on pricegrabber.  What I hate about this TV is the headphone jack, would been great if they put it on the side. PIP isnt a dual tuner PIP, you cant have 2 TV station on your TV at once. Its either a tuner and other TV inputs. This thing should last about 3 or 4 years or until LCD TV can do full 1080 resolution.[...]

Reviews.Title: Beauty in a Sleazy Dress--the Good, the Bad and the Ugly
Reviews.Author: B. Martin "altar ego"
Reviews.Content: The GOOD: We plugged in our new LNS2651D on 3/7/7, about an hour northwest of Tampa Bay.  Right out of the box,with an old Rabbit Ear antenna, we received five HD broadcasts.  The picture is amazing in both color and clarity.  The BAD: We reset the sound coming directly from its speakers, but because of speaker location underneath/below the screen,it lacks sparkle, esp at low to med. volume. The UGLY:  Imagine sending your intelligent,pretty young daughter out on her first date, with shoveled-on make-up, and wearing a cheap black vinyl dress.  The "Piano Black" case on this tv is a nightmare!  It shows a rippled effect, which gets distracting and even more tacky when outside light shines (even lightly) on it.  I'm hoping after the R&D; department who designed the case, is sent to Siberia, they redeem themselves by designing a Matte Finish slip- cover for this otherwise excellent TV.

Reviews.Title: Everything I have wanted in an upgrade
Reviews.Author: Julie Murphy
Reviews.Content: I had been looking at upgrading my pc monitor and went down the path of LCD TVs to fill a combo role.  Many reviewers said that the PC and console games looked fantastic,  HD TV was good over the air.That and I have purchased from Amazon before so I pulled the trigger.Primary use is PC/console 90% watching TV 10%.Screen is nice and bright and I have been very happy with this TV.I am currently using the PC in from my computer and an OTA HT atennea and both images are crisp.I did buy this for the 'gaming mode' function.  That works fine for the console which I think by nature is darker - but for the PC no way.Mike

Reviews.Title: beautiful set
Reviews.Author: B. Teasley
Reviews.Content: We just remodelled our kitchen, and created a TV niche easily visible from anywhere in the room including the eat-around island.  This was the largest size HDTV that would fit the spot, and I chose Samsung for its picture quality and 1080p capability.  We are very pleased with the picture quality and sound.  Quite an improvement over the tiny CRT kitchen sets of yesterday!

Reviews.Title: Product review for Samsung LNS2651D 26 inch flat screen
Reviews.Author: amm
Reviews.Content: Easy to set up and use. High quality appearance and great picture rendition too. Our kids love it.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: C. Ralston
Reviews.Content: Great picture right out of the box, and the set looks great too!

Reviews.Title: Nice picture
Reviews.Author: YC
Reviews.Content: Happy with this purchase.  Bright and sharp picture.  Easy setup.  lots of inputs.

Reviews.Title: Got a defect
Reviews.Content: My tv lost its image with nothing but a black screen a few months after I bought the tv. Brought it back to repair center, came back with reddish images. Horrible experience.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV, if it worked
Reviews.Author: D. Gittoes
Reviews.Content: The first TV that I ordered worked for 2 weeks before the picture would only appear in black in white.  The replacement TV also worked for only a short time before I had to send it back, too.

Reviews.Title: Excelente televisor lcd
Reviews.Author: El observador
Reviews.Content: He estado disfrutando de este tv por alredeor de 5 dias, la imagen es muy buena, facil de instalar, lo unico que se deberia mejorar es el sonido.

Reviews.Title: Great.
Reviews.Author: W. Cheyney "CheynSaw"
Reviews.Content: This is a great tv. I have never reviewed a product before but i feel like this one deserves it. I bought this tv so that i could play  xbox360 at home and at school. It is an awesome product and shows vibrant color and picture. There is no lag when gaming (that i have noticed), and the game mode on the tv helps with color and picture as well. I am very satisfied with this tv. the only gripe i have with it is that it is very expensive and soaked up half my summer earnings.  this is an great flat panel it is only too bad that i cant mount it on the wall at school. if you dont have the dough for this tv you may want to look at some slim fits, good hdtvs, half the price.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful finishing
Reviews.Author: Hector Perez "Camicata"
Reviews.Content: I changed for a 32 inches LCD from WalMart because of the price... same price bigger size, ...make sense but, to be honest... the WalMart unit is far less atractive; electronically I didn't find any difference and thats the reason I change it; I have plugged to the unit a Mini Mac, a Wii, a DVD Elite and a Mitsubishi VHS... only the last one doesn't look great...all the others... stunning clarity; I have a 53 inch Pioneer Elite and this unit (32) look as good as the other monster for less than $900.  Sound is good in quality but kind of poor in power... in both units (26 and 32); if you want to enjoy games or movies in a gameroom you will need a better sound system but, for a bedroom is enough.

Reviews.Title: Great cheap product!
Reviews.Author: da "da"
Reviews.Content: Vibrent colours with a good clear image.Sound is ok.

Reviews.Title: Poor quality picture
Reviews.Author: Rollin E. Drew
Reviews.Content: Since I own no other LCD HDTV my review is limited to this model Samsung television. However compared to our older Sony CRT, this Samsung is not even close as to the quality of picture resolution . Any angle of viewing other than direct further diminshes the picture quality. If this is an example of and LCD HDTV or Plasma, I don't want any more.

Reviews.Title: Excelente opci'on para un televisor LCD de buena marca
Reviews.Author: E. Subero
Reviews.Content: Tengo este televisor desde finales de enero.hasta ahora todo perfecto con el tv, lo unico lamentable es qe no hay senal HDTV en el país.La señal NTSC se ve muy bien, lo unico es que si se esta muy cerca del tv las imagenes se ven un poco pixeladas.Para jugar videojuegos lo he probado con mi nintendo Wii, los juegos tambien se ven un poco pixelados, aun no he comprado el cable para 480p del wii, sin embargo no hay efecto ghosting en juegos como dragon ball z.COn la computadora lo conecte via VGA para ver las peliculas usando el media center de windows vista, todo muy bien, la imagen del escritorio se ve totalmente nitida.Estoy por comprar un dvd player de estos upscaling para ver qe tal las  imagenes en 720p y 1080i, cuando lo tenga agregare los comentarios.Que no me gusta del TV?el control remoto es muy grande, la funcion PIP no se puede usar entre canales ntsc ahh y claro cuando uno le coloca nombre a los canales son muy pocos caracteres permitidos por lo cual no se puede colocar el nombre completo de la mayoria de los canales, esas son mis unicas quejas.En cuanto al audio he visto muy malos review, yo tengo el tv en mi cuarto y su audio es muy bueno, igualmente como lo tengo sobre mi PC, el tv tambien esta conectado a mi sistema de cornetas creative 7800 7.1 por lo cual es estupendo ver las peliculas, me falta es mejorar la imagen.Realmente lo recomiendo ampliamente.

ProductInfo.Features:
Stylish 26-inch LCD TV in black with integrated HDTV tuner; measures 26.6 x 20.9 x 8.5 inches (WxHxD) with included stand
Game Mode optimizes image quality and sound; connect portable digital players and control via remote (with RS232 cable connection)
1366 x 768-pixel resolution, 500 cd/m2 brightness, super-fast 8ms response time, 4000:1 contrast ratio, 170-degree viewing angle
Connections: 2 composite A/V (1 side), 2 S-Video (1 side), 1 component (Y/Pb/Pr), 2 HDMI, 2 RF, 1 USB, 1 RS232
Two stereo speakers, 5 watts apiece (10 watts total); SRS TruSurround XT virtual surround
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung LNS2651D 26-Inch LCD HDTV
